content: lcnr has marked this topic as resolved.

I would like to ask everyone here who commented if you could refrain in the future. It doesn't help moderation when other people chime in. At best, the issue stays the same, but it's a strong likelihood that it will inflame the issue. It's better for the sake of expedience and fairness that issues stay between the immediately involved parties and moderators. Unless a participant is removed from the project, they are still a community member, regardless of any possible moderation actions.
